name: header-inspector
description: Tiny service to inspect common and custom HTTP headers

scripts.docker:ensure-builder: docker buildx create --name headerinspectorbuilder --use --driver docker-container 2>/dev/null || docker buildx use headerinspectorbuilder && docker buildx inspect --bootstrap headerinspectorbuilder
scripts.docker:publish: npm run docker:ensure-builder && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t ${DOCKER_IMAGE:-$npm_package_config_dockerImage}:latest --push .
scripts.docker:build:amd64:local: npm run docker:ensure-builder && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t ${DOCKER_IMAGE:-$npm_package_config_dockerImage}:amd64 --load .
scripts.docker:build:arm64:local: npm run docker:ensure-builder && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t ${DOCKER_IMAGE:-$npm_package_config_dockerImage}:arm64 --load .
